title: GLTF Conversion Spec
description: Specification file for GLTF to DXTF conversion.

name.description: The overall name of the resulting prop or prop collection

src_dir.description: The relative directory of source files, relative to the CWD (which should be the location of this file).

srcs.description: A list of specifiers and settings for each input GLTF source file.

out_dir.description: The relative directory to save artifacts, relative to the CWD (which should be the location of this file).

dx_textures_subdir.description: The relative subdirectory to save textures, relative to 'out_dir'

dx_materials_subdir.description: The relative subdirectory to save materials, relative to 'out_dir'

material_spec_overrides.description: Contains overrides for DXSpec Materials. Each key must match an existing material name or '*' to override all materials. TODO: more complex override keys! TODO: actually include the fucking shcema.
